paragraph.value: Table 2 demonstrates the evaluation results of few-shot DA on the existing FewRel
set.  (1) All few-shot models suffer dramatic
falls when tested on a different domain. (2) Adversarial training does improve the results on the new
domain, yet still has large space for growth. (3) BERT-PAIR outperforms all other few-shot models on both 1.0 and 2.0
